issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Using the latest master from 05/08/2014
h4. Steps:
Run Kitchen Sink on BB and follow these steps:
Base UI -> Views -> Scroll Views -> Scrolling Tabs
On "Scrolling Tabs" try to drag the squares
h4. Result:
Squares do not move; scrollview does not scroll
h4. Expected result:
Squares must move when dragged - in other words, scrollview must scroll

comments.body:
Tested and verified the fix with:
Mac osx 10.9.2 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201405011408
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.v20140507163312
Node.JS Version: v0.10.13
NPM Version: 1.3.2
 acs@1.0.14
 alloy@1.4.0-dev
 npm@1.3.2
 titanium@3.3.0-dev
 titanium-code-processor@1.1.1
Device:
BB Z10 os 10.2.1
https://github.com/appcelerator/KitchenSink
